file.path: D:\TORRENT\________COMPLETED\Epub Collection#8(32Skulls)\Edward Bryant - While She Was Out (v5.0) (epub).epub
file.name: Edward Bryant - While She Was Out (v5.0) (epub).epub

tika.dc.description: On a casual errand, a woman is forced to fight for her life when she is attacked by a group of relentless and evil strangers. Going beyond the pale, Ed Bryant's short story is a gripping and fast paced thriller that is sure to make you think twice about your next trip to the mall. This is the short story that is the basis for the 2008 film starring Kim Basinger and Lukas Haas.
